title: Pedros Trixie Fixed Gear Chrome Multi-Tool
features: New and improved, 8-function fixed-gear multi-tool. Now available in chrome finish!
Made from 5mm thick heat-treated tool steel for strength and long-lasting performance
Mounts to frame's bottle cage mount with including wing bolts
187mm (7.4in) length and ergonomic shape provide excellent leverage and comfort.
Updated design features new 4mm/5mm hex, 8, 9, 10, and 15mm box end wrenches, improved lockring wrench, and improved bottle opener.
description: The ultimate multi-tool for the fixed-gear rider, the Pedro's Trixie Fixed Gear Chrome Multi-Tool has an updated design and eight different functions. Its new 4mm/5mm hex bit comes in a rubber holder, plus there's 8/9/10/15mm box end wrenches, an improved lockring wrench and an improved bottle opener. The Trixie is laser cut from 5mm thick heat-treated steel and attaches to your water bottle mounts with included wing nuts, so you'll always be prepared.
Updated design with stylish chrome finish
